about me!

My name is Adam Wong. I'm living in beautiful Portland Oregon and working for chroma where I double as a full stack computer wizard, amateur designer and wannabe economics hacker. I have a wonderful boyfriend, Vince, and 2 dogs. I also drink too much coffee and I'm obsessed with Soylent.
